revised_title: Observations of Luminous Phenomena and Their Meteorological Implications
tldr: The author documents various instances of luminous arches and streams in the night sky, detailing their appearance, movement, and color. He also discusses their potential meteorological significance and notes that they are more common in the north of England, where they are called 'Streamers,' 'Merry Dancers,' or 'Petty Dancers.'
